title: A Face in the Crowd
actors: Andy Griffith,Patricia Neal,Anthony Franciosa,Walter Matthau,Lee Remick,Percy Waram,Paul McGrath,Rod Brasfield,Marshall Neilan,Alexander Kirkland,Charles Irving,Howard Smith,Kay Medford,Big Jeff Bess,Henry Sharp
summary: The rise of a raucous hayseed named Lonesome Rhodes from itinerant Ozark guitar picker to local media rabble-rouser to TV superstar and political king-maker. Marcia Jeffries is the innocent Sarah Lawrence girl who discovers the great man in a back-country jail and is the first to fall under his spell.

title: Deadbeat at Dawn
actors: Jim Van Bebber,Megan Murphy,Marc Pitman,Ric Walker,Paul Harper,Maureen Allisse,Tom Burns,John Bradley,Steven Bognar,Julia Reichert
summary: Goose leaves the gang life behind after pleas from his girlfriend.  But it isn't long before he's pulled back into the world of violence.
